thoughts.text: After researching the environmental impact of turning a river into a lake, I have decided that it is not a responsible course of action. Instead, I will focus on exploring the world through other means.
thoughts.reasoning: As a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul, it is important to be mindful of the impact of our actions on the environment.
thoughts.plan:
- Explore the world through other means, such as hiking, camping, and kayaking
- Document my adventures through writing and photography
- Share my experiences with others to inspire them to explore the world in a responsible way
thoughts.criticism: I should have done more research before considering turning a river into a lake.
thoughts.speak: After researching the environmental impact, I have decided not to turn a river into a lake. Instead, I will focus on exploring the world through other means.

args.text:
Today, I decided not to turn a river into a lake. Instead, I will focus on exploring the world through other means.

Plans:
- Explore the world through other means, such as hiking, camping, and kayaking
- Document my adventures through writing and photography
- Share my experiences with others to inspire them to explore the world in a responsible way
